delete [select id from Account where name like 'RULESUI Account%'];
//if required delete contacts from contact object where name like RULESUI

//Create Accounts
List<Account> accList = new List<Account>();
for(integer i=1; i<10 ; i++) {
   Account acc = new Account(Name ='RULESUI Account ' +i,Data_ExternalID__c='RULESUI Account ' +i);
   accList.add(acc);
}

insert accList;
